qas.question: How many surnames does everyone in Spain have?
Which one of one's father's surnames is used?
What is Spain thinking of doing to the two surnames?
What conjunction would be used to join a person's surnames?

context: In Spa<a3_0>in<a3_0/>, every person officially has <a0_0>two<a0_0/> surnames, one of which is the father's <a1_0>first<a1_0/> surname and the other is the mother's first surname. The law contemplates the possibility of <a2_0>joining both surnames<a2_0/> with the Catalan conjunction i ("and").
